text: Anneleen Van Bossuyt (born 10 January 1980 in Ghent) is a Belgian Member of the European Parliament (MEP) since January 2015 for the New Flemish Alliance (N-VA), which sits in the European Conservatives and Reformists Group. She succeeded Louis Ide. She is member of the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection (IMCO), of which she is the chair since June 2017. She is also member of the delegation for relations with the United States. Van Bossuyt is N-VA's main candidate in the Ghent municipal elections of October 2018. ==External links== * Personal website ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ghent Category:New Flemish Alliance MEPs Category:MEPs for Belgium 2014–2019
title: Anneleen Van Bossuyt
